description: A decision to go to Teriberka was quite a spontaneous one. I was chasing Northern Lights on Lofoten islands and didn’t really like what was displayed there. Updating the space weather site again and again I’ve noticed that there is a strong activity on 24th of October. So the idea was born. I decided to go somewhere north just for a night specifically to shoot the lights. I’ve checked the flights map and found out that the most northern spot where you can get with a direct flight from Moscow is Murmansk. Searching the landscapes around Murmansk I came across a ships graveyard in Teriberka. The result of my imagination is seen on the photo - this is exactly the image that I wanted to shoot.
title: ADM0142
